thread.title: Birch Sponsors Tech Night at the Ballpark
thread.title_full: Birch Sponsors Tech Night at the Ballpark

author: admin
title: Birch Sponsors Tech Night at the Ballpark
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Birch Communications, Inc. 
ATLANTA, Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Birch Communications, Inc., ("Birch") a leading nationwide provider of communications, network and cloud services to small, mid-sized, enterprise and wholesale businesses, is proud to announce its sponsorship of the 3(rd) annual Tech Night at the Ballpark in Miami. Tech Night at the Ballpark is an annual networking event for IT executives, business leaders and developers passionate about technology and communication. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20110606/CG14010LOGO 
Tech Night at the Ballpark allowed the Birch Team to interact with hundreds of local business owners, influencers, and technology enthusiasts from various industries and verticals. For some, this was their first introduction to Birch, and it was a great forum to tell the Birch story and present the full suite of voice and cloud solutions . The casual atmosphere and unique ambiance of a baseball game was both inviting and engaging and conducive for demoing the TotalCloud速 PBX Communicator app via smartphones and TotalCloud速 File Storage app via smartphone and iPad. The event provided educational and networking opportunities for business leaders searching for the latest trends in technology and communication. 
"Tech Night was a great opportunity for business leaders, technology influencers and enthusiasts in South Florida, all driven by a common passion for the latest technology, to network and watch baseball. In previous years, the event has proved to be a tremendous success with the presence of various CIO's, developers and leaders within the South Florida technology community," said Mark McGuire, Market Director at Birch. "This was a great opportunity to network, generate interest, and strategize with fellow South Florida business leaders." 
Birch continues to grow its product offering and sales force in South Florida because it is an emerging tech hub. In addition to TotalCloud速 PBX, which is available everywhere, Birch offers South Florida its BirchLink速 Internet services with speeds up to 1Gbps using T1, Ethernet over Copper (Ethernet) or Fiber technologies on Birch's private IP-Network. 
A May 2015 CNBC report notes, " Miami's tech push has been fed by three deriving forces; the John S and James L. Knight Foundation, which poured millions in grants to build a technology ecosystem; eMerge Americas, a South Florida tech conference, and Miami-Dade County, which invested in eMerge Americas and an incubator called Venture Hive ." The market place is offering technology companies and start-ups lucrative tax advantages and creative strength fueled by a diverse workforce. Birch's extensive product offering is a natural fit for technology businesses, making this event and others in South Florida a perfect sponsorship opportunity. 
About Birch Communications 
Birch Communications, Inc. is a leading communications, network, cloud and IT solutions provider. Recognized for exceptional customer experience, Birch delivers compelling solutions that assist small, mid-sized, enterprise and wholesale businesses to increase their productivity. Its industry-leading product portfolio is available nationwide and includes Metro-Fiber, Metro-Ethernet, unified communications (UC), hosted phone systems, hosted data centers, and hosted file storage services. For more information, visit birch.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/birch-sponsors-tech-night-at-the-ballpark-300137747.html 
SOURCE Birch Communications, Inc.
